review: Mam Dr Seema Thakur is indeed a genius doctor, I and my wife visited, she patient friendly and her suggestion to patient is worth billion dollars,, ultra professional, I suggest ever one those have genetic and gyne problems,, she the Dr is helping hand. Thanks mam.
